plugin.name: cycle_tabs
plugin.author: Daak
plugin.purpose: Cycle through channel tabs via accelerator

muclient.script:
function cPlugin(str) if str == "prevTab" or str == "nextTab" then CallPlugin("b555825a4a5700c35fa80780", str) else CallPlugin("b555825a4a5700c35fa80780", "setTabByName", str) end end
function nextTab() cPlugin("nextTab") end
function prevTab() cPlugin("prevTab") end
function tabset(name, line, wildcards) cPlugin(wildcards[1]) end
Accelerator("alt + right", '\\\\\\CallPlugin("3a01e1807c17390aa06135a8", "nextTab")') Accelerator("alt + left", '\\\\\\CallPlugin("3a01e1807c17390aa06135a8", "prevTab")')
